title: FRC 566.020 — Spectral Modes and Relaxation in UCC
description: We linearize the UCC evolution for u=ln C around a stationary equilibrium and derive modal relaxation rates τ_n=1/(D_C λ_n) from the Laplace spectrum. A 1D numerical demo illustrates exponential modal decay and parameter recovery.
notes: Prepared for Zenodo concept DOI; add communities and relations on publish.
